name: Demon Clef
description:
Demon Clef

You hear a voice...

"Gather them...you will be stronger together..."

Playing with sound on is recommended!
If you cannot hear sound in WebGL make sure to click in the game window

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move and play Notes

SPACE to Jump


All music, art, and code, original work created for this game, were made during the Brackey's Game Jam 2021.1

One being begins their journey through the floating Isles seeking a great power. With their axe in hand they challenge Demons to a musical battle to prove their worth and gain their favor.
